cont.entity_a: Signal strength reduces with walls in between.
cont.entity_b: Signal is strong and maintains connection well.

cont.entity_a: Did not work in shared mode due to DNS passthrough issue. Easy to use for creating a hotspot.
cont.entity_b: Access point setup is problematic. Setup can be challenging without technical knowledge. Setup process can be confusing and time-consuming.

cont.entity_a: Does not work with DSL. Not suitable as a regular DSL router. Worked with cable internet but stopped working after warranty expired.
cont.entity_b: Works well with various devices but not with PS3 wirelessly. Works well with different operating systems and devices.

cont.entity_a: Good for traveling and securing connections.

cont.entity_b: Bad product support experience with Linksys. Customer service is effective in resolving setup issues.
Best for running 3rd party firmware. Firmware limitations restrict functionality.

cont.entity_a: WPA configuration is quick but requires daily reboot.
cont.entity_b: May have issues with maintaining wireless settings.
Router provides good security options and features.
Good range and speed for G standard. Offers good performance for older model.
Durable and reliable over several years of use.

cont.entity_a: Worked with cable internet but stopped working after warranty expired.
